title: Are there any advantages for kids to use technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure there is, but it should never be used to replace one on one with a parent. There are some great games and learning aids for kids but it does not replace imagination, running outside, swimming,reading,dance,a hobby etc. If used in conjunction with other activities technology can be great
yeah, read more about this ….. Advantages of technology on children
